title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, target audience, and gather requirements for the immersive language learning platform.

title: System Architecture Design for ImmersiveLanguageLearning
description: Design the overall system architecture focusing on maintainability, modularity, scalability. Include components for virtual reality rendering (VR), language learning modules, user interactions, error handling, and performance optimizations. Consider edge cases, adhere to best practices, and implement design principles such as SOLID and DRY. Provide detailed documentation and diagrams for each component and their interactions. Break down the architecture into modular, reusable sub-systems for efficient development and maintenance. Ensure that the system is secure, accessible, and can handle real-time user interaction in a VR environment. In addition, outline strategies for testing, deployment, and maintenance of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, and stress tests. Address areas such as code quality, documentation standards, version control, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and security best practices. Provide guidelines for handling changes in requirements or technology throughout the project lifecycle.

title: Virtual Reality Environment Development
description: Develop the virtual reality environments for language learning scenarios, including realistic 3D models, animations, and interactions.

title: Language Learning Module Development
description: Develop the language learning modules, including speech recognition, grammar exercises, vocabulary drills, and progress tracking.

title: Database Design and Implementation for Immersive Language Learning
description: Design and implement a scalable, secure, highly available, and NoSQL/SQL compatible database schema. The schema should ensure data integrity, normalization, and real-time updates for user interactions. Consider data replication strategies to minimize latency. The design should also account for storage of user data, language learning progress, and virtual environment assets. Dependencies include the System Architecture Design.

title: User Authentication and Authorization (Updated)
description:
Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including secure login, user roles, and access control. For enhanced security, include a password strength check, and consider using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for session management. Additionally, investigate OAuth or similar standards for seamless third-party integration. Ensure the system adheres to data privacy regulations and best practices. Consider implementing multi-factor authentication for increased security. For progressive web app (PWA) support, research and suggest suitable solutions that align with our technology stack. Include a review of existing solutions and a comparison of their pros and cons in the documentation. Upon completion, conduct thorough testing and documentation to ensure all functionalities meet requirements. Lastly, consult with the security-specialist for any potential vulnerabilities or best practices.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment Pipeline - REVIEW (Updated)
description: Update the Continuous Integration and Deployment pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment process for the Immersive Language Learning platform in production environments. This includes setting up a CI/CD tool such as Jenkins or CircleCI, creating build scripts, configuring test suites, establishing deployment strategies (with focus on Blue-Green deployment), using Docker containers for consistency across environments, implementing GitHub Actions for additional automation, and integrating existing linting tools for code quality checks. Also, consider adding monitoring and alerting tools like Sentry or Datadog to ensure smooth operation of the pipeline.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including developer guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides.
